```{r include = F}
library(vroom)
library(dplyr, quietly=T)
```

### Volcano Plot of MR Results Against QTL Dataset
`r sprintf("![Volcano Plot of MR Results](%s)", params$volcano_plot)`

### Statistically Significant MR results (after Bonferroni correction)

```{r echo=F}
coloc_results <- vroom::vroom(params$mr_results, show_col_types = F) |> subset(p.adjusted < 0.05)
knitr::kable(mr_results)
```

### Coloc Results
```{r echo=F}
coloc_results <- vroom::vroom(params$coloc_results, show_col_types = F)
knitr::kable(coloc_results)
```
